actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage. If the jackalope moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack  the attack deals an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If the jackalope is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the jackalope instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The jackalope has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing.

special_abilities.name: Mimicry
special_abilities.desc: The jackalope can imitate sounds it hears frequently, such as a simple phrase or an animal noise. Recognizing the sounds as imitation requires a DC 14 Insight check.
